titles.title: A resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

calendar.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship ordered to be reported an original measure.

committee.name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

action.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Kerry without amendment. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/18/2007--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for the 110th Congress.
